content: Mathias is an extremely gifted programmer with great communication skills.

Clear and helpful

Everything went well, as usual. Mathias knows a lot about neural networks. Totally recommended!
Excellent, very efficient, explained what he did very well, nice to work with, will work with him again, awesome help!
Mathias went above and beyond to help me understand some Java concepts. Anyone that needs help breaking down larger concepts and asks for his help will definitely the help they're looking for!

Mathias helped me through my first codementor session and I couldn't have left a better impression of this platform. He was considerate and made sure I understand the concepts behind the code before moving on.
Loved working with Mathias! He was able to meet me quickly and explained everything patiently and thoroughly.
Mathias is very knowledgable, friendly and serviceminded.. I have used him twice, and most likely will again.
second time i hire Mathias for a job. Excellent work ethics and attention to details. Delivery  of code right on time! I'm very pleased!

Excellent job. Easy to work with. It was a pleasure working with Mathias.

A great and reliable data analyst. I have learnt a lot from Mathias.
I've worked with many engineers in the past, Mathias got me going from the start. I will work with him again.
Mathias is great so knowledgable, he helped me out  a lot, highly recommended, he talks you through everything helping you learn and improve. Thank you.

Mathias was very knowledgeable not only with Python but also ML and AI algorithms.  He was also very responsive, and flexible with scheduling.  Overall Mathias was very helpful and a pleasure to work with.
Mathias, is a very good tutor, he has a wast knowledge and helped me understand and solve my problem, highly recommended, thank you.
Mathis was very helpful and has done the work in a professional manner. 100% recommended (as always).

Always professional -on time, well informed!
A fantastic mentor

Mathias has been super helpful implementing our new software. His knowledge is very deep, but most importantly he is very helpful and his collaboration and teaching skills are excellent! He is great to work with!
He is awesome!  Explains concepts very well.
Very knowledgable and helpful
So helpful as always. Took the time to go over the concepts to make sure I was understanding rather than just solving problems.
Mathias was easy to work with, quickly understood my problem and helped to come up with a simple solution. Highly recommend!
Mathias is a fantastic instructor. He answered all my questions with great examples to help me understand.

Mathias was so quick to help and pointed out where my code was running into problems very quickly. It was such an efficient session. Thank you so much. Would definitely reach out for help again when needed.
Everything went perfect. Mathias really knows what he's doing. 100% recommended.
Mathias is excellent at python coding, data processing, analysis and regular expression.
amazing help! rock star!

I needed help with Keras modelling for a computer vision task. Everything went perfectly fine. 
Mathias showed patience during the tutoring session, explaining everything very professionally. 
I recommend him 100%. I am 100% sure I will be back at him if I get into troubles with my code again.
Thank you a lot!

Mathias is an excellent developer, he not only submitted my project, but also guided me on how to run through it as well as gave nice explanation as comments during every stage.

Cheers Pal, Will definitely contact you next time I am in problem.
Really speedy and high quality work. I won't hesitate to work with Mathias again and looking forward to the next project!

Mathias was able to help me parse through my data, processes it such that it could be used for deep learning models that I wanted to test. He explains concepts very clearly and is very thorough. Highly recommend him for any Python related projects or Deep Learning with Music Applications.

Mathias was able to demystify the Music21 python library for me and explain how all the code in a specific example I was interested in worked. It probably saved me hours of trying to figure it out alone. He's very good at explaining things!
Excellent work, highly recommended. Would work with Mathias again any time. A++
Mathias is the best tutor if you're doing web scrapping. Try him and you will glean a lot of information in minutes. He is worth your coin!
helpful and knowledgeable and finds way to get answer

very helpful and fast working
Professional, Very helpful, Knows all his code and helped me so much, very easy going. Full knowledge of Data Science, Machine Learning, Padas.
Mathias was a pleasure to work with, and was a very clear and organized mentor. I look forward to working with him again in the future!
Awesome again!
Clean good work. Great communication. Well done
Perfect work!
Mathias is the best mentor ever!!!

Very quick on the ball Java bug solved and my favourite part is that he was nice enough to ensure he could solve my problem prior to wanting to schedule a meeting with me -- unlike many of the other programmers on here. Often programmers won't even look at the issue prior to scheduling a meetup and then they very well may not even be able to fix it. Matthias ensured that he could have this thing solved before we set up the meeting -- the right way to provide service. For this I am more than happy to pay! I will definitely come back to him for problem solving in my code in the future! :)
Great work, fast response, great communication.
Had a great session with Mathias, he was very helpful and efficient! Will definitely be working with him again in the future.
Mathias has excellent customer service, expertise and speed of delivery. I have never worked with someone at this caliber, and I was beyond pleased with his work. Highly recommend!
Explained things well and answered all questions that I had
